pages.title: Bees that produce items
pages.text: Even though most bees produce combs, some directly produce items. For these bees you wont need a centrifuge to process their outputs. An example for such bees is the $(l)Lumber Bee$(). There are also bees that output multiple items like the $(l)Water Bee$() and some that even produce items and combs such as the $(l)Ender Bee$(). So keep in mind to filter the different outputs of your beehives when you automate!
